properties.title: Azure Lighthouse Initial Onboard for Remote Infrastructure Monitoring and Management (RIMM)

options.text: This deployment enables Azure Lighthouse for the RIMM operations team to perform read-only discovery and initial monitoring of your environment. The Reader, Support Request Contributor, and Managed Services Relationship Delete roles are provsioned for onboarding. You can review the Service Providers pane in the Azure Portal to monitor, add additional delegations, or remove access at any time. Please contact your onboarding manager if you have any issues or questions.

elements.name: mgmtSub
elements.label: Enter the GUID ID of the management subscription where the Azure Lighthouse resource definition will be created.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be a subscription ID in GUID format.
